name: DuckPro Duck Calls - Duck Hunting Calls for Mallards - BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
name_original: DuckPro Duck Calls - Duck Hunting Calls for Mallards - BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
description:
Duck calls and duck calls & sounds for your phone. The DuckPro duck call app with duck hunting calls for mallards provides you REAL duck calls at your fingertips. These duck calls are clear and crisp duck calls. 8 unique duck call sounds included. This is the best duck caller lite app you will find. Connect the app to any BLUETOOTH speaker and amplifier system to play the duck calls loud.

FEATURES:
- 8 duck hunting calls
- Effective, realistic and clear duck calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker to play the duck calls free
- Duck hunting calls can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the duck calls
- The soundtracks allow you to set the duck calls and focus on duck hunting
- This is a great addition to other duck calls & tactics that you bring to the field or water for duck hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included
- If you want to be a duck commander and bring in more ducks (where legal) then this is the app for you
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for duck calls at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately to use for duck hunting

Duck Calls included in "DuckPro"
- Basic Quack - Duck Call
- Greeting Call - Duck Call
- Feed Call - Duck Call
- Hail Call - Duck Call
- Comeback Call - Duck Call
- Lonesome Hen - Duck Calls for Duck Hunting
- Pleading Call - Duck Call for Duck Hunting
- Mallard Whistle - Duck Calls

Download DuckPro duck calls app for mallard ducks and start having duck hunting success today!
